description: Numbers n such that 3 + (integer formed from first n digits after decimal point in pi) is prime.
links: G. L. Honaker, Jr. and C. K. Caldwell, Prime Curios! 1415929
author: _G. L. Honaker, Jr._, Jan 12 2001
extensions: Term a(7) = 451 added by _Patrick De Geest_, Nov 25 2001. No more terms below 10^3.
